Class TexturedButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component.Component
      • com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component.Button

  • public class TexturedButton
extends Button
    Creates a button and allows textures to be drawn for it
    Author:
    Craig
